languages.text: Hits from this weapon cause all allies adjacent to the target to attack it.

traits.locale_text: Hits from this weapon cause all allies adjacent to the target to attack it.

languages.text: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.
languages.original_text: Hits from this weapon cause all allies adjacent to the target to attack it.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

languages.text: 使用者がこの武器での攻撃で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、対象に隣接しているすべての味方は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がこの武器での攻撃で{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、対象に隣接しているすべての味方は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。

languages.text: Когда атака этим оружием {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадает{/g}, все союзники персонажа на соседних с целью клетках совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} против нее.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text: Когда атака этим оружием {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадает{/g}, все союзники персонажа на соседних с целью клетках совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} против нее.

Когда атака этим оружием {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадает{/g}, все союзники персонажа на соседних с целью клетках совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} против нее.

languages.text: Wenn der Angriff des Trägers mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, machen alle Verbündeten auf Feldern neben dem Ziel einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} auf das Ziel.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Angriff des Trägers mit dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, machen alle Verbündeten auf Feldern neben dem Ziel einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} auf das Ziel.

languages.text: Kullanan kişinin bu silahla yaptığı saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} hedefin bitişiğindeki tüm dost birimler, ona karşı {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişinin bu silahla yaptığı saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} hedefin bitişiğindeki tüm dost birimler, ona karşı {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une cible avec cette arme, tous les alliés adjacents à la cible lui infligent une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une cible avec cette arme, tous les alliés adjacents à la cible lui infligent une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que el usuario ataca con esta arma e {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}, todos los aliados que están adyacentes al objetivo efectúan un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra él.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el usuario ataca con esta arma e {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}, todos los aliados que están adyacentes al objetivo efectúan un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra él.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，邻近目标的所有盟友都会对其发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，邻近目标的所有盟友都会对其发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
